title: Alex Evenings Women's Long Rosette Mother of The Bride Dress with Short Sleeves, Wedding Guest (Petite and Regular Sizes)
description: Elegant Fit & Flare Design: This long fit-and-flare dress features soft, all-over stretch sequin corded lace, ensuring a flattering and comfortable fit for mothers of the bride and groom or wedding guests.
Chic V-Neckline with Cap Sleeves: The gown showcases a stylish V-neckline and delicate cap sleeves, adding a touch of sophistication and feminine charm.
Ideal for Special Occasions: Designed for formal events, this dress combines timeless style with comfort, featuring intricate sequin lacework perfect for weddings, evening parties, or gala events.
Bra-Friendly Design: Stay comfortable and confident all night long with the bra-friendly design of this midi dress, allowing you to enjoy the festivities without compromise.

Sizes for Every Woman: At Alex Evenings, we embrace the beauty of every woman. Our inclusive sizing, from Petite to Regular, and Plus sizes, ensures that our dresses are designed to complement various body types.

Step into elegance with the Alex Evenings Women's Long Rosette Mother of the Bride Dress, designed to make you shine at weddings and formal occasions. This gown features a stunning all-over rosette lace fabric, enhanced with shimmering sequin details for added glamour. The soft material provides comfort without compromising style, while the flattering long A-line silhouette ensures a graceful fit. With a scoop illusion neckline and short sleeves, this gown is both chic and bra-friendly, making it a practical choice for any special occasion. The back zipper allows for easy wear, making it the perfect gown for mothers of the bride, wedding guests, and other formal events.
